His main achievement is providing financial stability and support for his family.

loans.use: to buy machine tools for his job in construction.

loans.name: Anarkul

texts.ru: Анаркул, 47 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Анаркул среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 19 лет назад с покупки скота на 15,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Анаркул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 8 коров, 50 овец, на 1,70 Га земли она выращивает картофель и люцерну для реализации. На ежедневной основе продает молоко. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Анаркул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойных коров для увеличения объемов реализации экологически чистого домашнего молока. Доходы от кредита Анаркул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение ее бизнеса и покупку дома для дома.
texts.en:
Anarkul is 47 years old and married. She and her husband have five  children. Anarukul has received secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, she raises livestock and grows farm crops, having started 19 years ago by buying cattle for 15,000 KGS. Thanks to Anarkul’s hard work, at present she has eight cows and 50 sheep on her farm. She grows potatoes and sainfoin [a plant used for animal fodder] for sale on her field of 1.7 ha [4.2 acres]. She sells milk on a daily basis. 

In order to develop her business further, Anarkul has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance association for a loan in the amount of 100,000 KGS to buy dairy cows in order to increase the sales volume of her environmentally clean homestead milk. Anarukul plans to use the resulting revenues for a further business development and home [improvements].

loans.use: to purchase some dairy cows in order to increase the volume of eco-friendly milk sales.

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena is 58 years old and married with seven children. With three children in school, Lucena works very hard to provide for them.

Lucena runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, home care products and other groceries.

Lucena has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, soap, shampoo, biscuits, candies and other groceries. 

In the future, Lucena would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, beverages, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Marcela

texts.en:
Marcela has a small mango farm in Tangub, Philippines, from which she earns a good income every quarter for her family to survive. To generate additional earnings, she wants to plant bananas and grow corn. 

Marcela makes it a point to do good land preparation to have maximum yield and a good income. She recently needed a loan to pay for the clearing and plowing of land, corn seed sowing and mounting, and holing and planting of banana seedlings, so she borrowed from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative.

Marcela wishes to have more produce and be able to supply agri-products in the market.

loans.use: to pay for the clearing and plowing of land, corn seed sowing and mounting, and holing and planting of banana seedlings

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Lorena is 53 years old, and one child is still in school.

Lorena has a food-vending business in the Philippines. Lorena requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients and materials like meat, frozen foods, spices, bamboo sticks, etc., for her food-vending business.

Lorena has been in this business for two years. Lorena would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and materials like meat, frozen foods, spices, bamboo sticks, etc., for her food-vending business

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 58 years old and married with two children. Lucia works very hard to provide for them.

Lucia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, beverages, and other groceries.

Lucia has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as tuba (local wine), soap, shampoo, candies, snack foods, coffee and other groceries. 

In the future, Lucia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, snack foods, beverages, and other groceries

loans.name: Nazar

texts.ru: 47 летный мужчина Назар. Он из Шахритус. Шахритус  находится на юго-западной части Таджикистана.  Шахритус самая теплая точка Республики. В Шахритусе хорошие условия для развития сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Назар давно живет в Шахритузе. Он женатый и имеет детей. У него один сын и одна дочка. Жена занимается растениеводством. Ей в работе помогает дети. Дети является главным помощником. Назар работает учителем в средней школе. Он добрый, веселый и заботливый мужчина. Свободное время Назар во дворе занимается растениеводством. Данный момент он готовится к новому посеву урожай. Ему нужны минеральные удобрения и семян кукуруза. Назар решил посадить кукурузу. С такими планами он хочет взять кредит, и приобрести минеральные удобрения и семян кукуруза. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ему достичь своих целей.
texts.en: Nazar is a 47-year-old man from Shahrituz. Shahrituz is situated in the south-west part of Tajikistan. Shahrituz is the warmest part of the Republic. Shahrituz has good conditions for farming. Nazar has been living in Shahrituz for a long time. He is married and has children: a son and a daughter. His wife grows crops. Her children help her work. They are the principal help. Nazar works as a teacher in a secondary school. He is a kind, cheerful and caring man. In his spare time, Nazar grows crops in his yard. At the moment he is preparing to sow new crops. He needs mineral fertilizer and corn seeds. Nazar has decided to plant corn. With these plans he wants to take a loan, and acquire the mineral fertilizer and corn seeds. The requested loan will help him to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer and corn seeds.

loans.name: Maysara

texts.ru:
Майсаре 35 лет. Она замужняя женщина и мать двоих детей. Майсара добрая и гостеприимная женщина. Она около 3 лет занимается земледелием.
В этом году Майсара посадила арбуз на 1 Га земельный участок. Еще немного времени осталось до сбора урожая. На данный момент Майсаре надо обработать урожай минеральными удобрениями. Она планирует получить качественный и богатый урожай, поэтому она хочет купить качественные удобрения. Но на такое количество удобрений ей не хватает не большая сумма денег. Майсара запрашивает кредит для приобретения минеральных удобрений. Она верит в Вас и Вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Maysara is 35 years old. She is a married woman and the mother of two children. Maysara is a kind and hospitable woman. She has been growing crops for about three years.

This year Maysara has planted watermelon on a one hectare plot of land. Not long is left until it is time to gather the harvest. At the moment Maysara needs to treat her crops with mineral fertilizer. She plans to get a good quality and rich harvest, and so she wants to buy good quality fertilizer. But she does not quite have all the money needed to buy such a quantity of fertilizer. Maysara is requesting a loan to buy the mineral fertilizer. She believes in you and in your kindness.

loans.use: to buy good quality mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигоре 34 лет. Она из района А.Джоми. Нигора замужем и замечательная мать двоих детей. Из за трудного финансого положение семьи её муж был вынужден уехат на заработки. Сама Нигора очень ответственная женщина. Она одна занимается воспитанием детей и одновременно шьет национальные женские платья.  Её клиенты очень довольны. Нигора имеет 10 лет опыт работы в этой сфере. Все эти годы он сшила на старой швейной машинке и так как сейчас её машинка хорошо не работает, она решила купить новую. Её основная проблема то, что она не имеет достаточно денег. Но Нигора не теряет надежду. Она очень верит в Вас.
texts.en: Nigora is 34 years old. She is from the A. Jomi region. Nigora is married and she is a wonderful mother to two children. Due to her family's difficult financial situation, her husband has gone away to earn money. Nigora herself is a very responsible woman. She is raising the children on her own and simultaneously sews women's national dresses.Her clients are very satisfied. Nigora has ten years of experience in this sphere. All these years she has been sewing on an old sewing machine, and since her sewing machine is not working well now she has decided to buy a new one. Her main problem is that she does not have enough money. But Nigora does not lose hope. She really believes in you.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Edwin Javier

texts.es: Javier es un joven trabajador, tiene 24 años de edad, el se dedica a la crianza y comercio de pollos, Javier trabaja cosechando flores, Javier vive en una casa por la que paga arriendo  y allí tiene galpones  en donde tiene a sus animales,  Javier solicita el dinero del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de pollos, Javier espera mejorar su negocio para asi salir adelante y tratar de mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Javier is a hard-working young man. He is 24 years old and earns a living raising and selling chickens. Javier works harvesting flowers. He lives in a house he is renting, and there he has sheds in which he keeps his animals.

Javier is requesting the loan to invest the money in purchasing chickens. Javier hopes to improve his business and thus his financial situation and he is trying to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase chickens.
